occupationalCategory[TOK_Q_DELIM]インフラエンジ.query:
occupationalCategory: A category describing the job, preferably using a term from a taxonomy such as [BLS O*NET-SOC](http://www.onetcenter.org/taxonomy.html), [ISCO-08](https://www.ilo.org/public/english/bureau/stat/isco/isco08/) or similar, with the property repeated for each applicable value. Ideally the taxonomy should be identified, and both the textual label and formal code for the category should be provided.\n
Note: for historical reasons, any textual label and formal code provided as a literal may be assumed to be from O*NET-SOC.

workHours[TOK_Q_DELIM]週4日･5日 (ﾘﾓｰﾄ：可)[TO.query: workHours: The typical working hours for this job (e.g. 1st shift, night shift, 8am-5pm).

name[TOK_Q_DELIM]渋谷・新宿（渋谷駅）[TOK_Q_DELIM].query: name: The name of the item.

estimatedSalary[TOK_Q_DELIM]610,000〜770,.query: estimatedSalary: An estimated salary for a job posting or occupation, based on a variety of variables including, but not limited to industry, job title, and location. Estimated salaries  are often computed by outside organizations rather than the hiring organization, who may not have committed to the estimated value.

experienceRequirements[TOK_Q_DELIM]・Linu.query: experienceRequirements: Description of skills and experience needed for the position or Occupation.

description[TOK_Q_DELIM]自社サービス基盤としてのシステム.query: description: A description of the item.

skills[TOK_Q_DELIM]PHP・Java・Linux・LAMP[T.query: skills: A statement of knowledge, skill, ability, task or any other assertion expressing a competency that is desired or required to fulfill this role or to work in this occupation.
